description.narrative: The Project’s objective is to enhance the climate resilience of key transport and drainage infrastructure in Greater Bujumbura while strengthening the country’s capacity to manage and prevent natural disasters.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Computerized financial and accounting system | Description :On or before six months after the Effective Date,the Recipient shall adopt the ESIA and RAP, as described in Section I. of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement.In furtherance ofthe provisions of this Section II.B of this Schedule 2, the Recipient shall (a) establish, within PMU, a computerized financial andaccounting system satisfactory to the Association, and successfully train relevant staff | Due Date :23-Oct-2015

Finance Agreement :External Auditor Recruitment | Description :No later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, theRecipient shall recruit, in accordance with the provisions of Section III of this Schedule 2, external financial auditors, withqualifications, experience, and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association, for purposes of the audit referred to inSection II.B.3 of this Schedule. | Due Date :23-Oct-2015

Finance Agreement :Safeguards | Description :On or before six months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall adopt the ESIAand RAP, as described in Section I. of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement.In furtherance of the provisions of this Section II.Bof this Schedule 2, the Recipient shall (a) establish, within PMU, a computerized financial and accounting system satisfactory tothe Association, and successfully train relevant staff | Due Date :31-Dec-2015

title.narrative: Number of people supported by participatory evaluation of disaster risks and operational early warning and response systems, of which female (%)
Reduction in unit transport cost along NR-1 in Project Impact Area (PIA)
Number of municipalities supported for emergency information dissemination, emergency response and contingency planning
Number of kilometers of newly constructed/ rehabilitated drainage network
Number of people with access to improved drainage in the areas served by the project of which female (%)
Annual maintenance budget and percentage share of annual road maintenance budget disbursed
Road Database completed and tested for paved and unpaved roads
Contingency funding mechanism established and ready to provide access to financial resources in case of an eligible crisis or emergency
Transport strategy and road investment plan completed
